author: bencomic

right.text: guy what illogical problems with american culture in particular?

left.text: man, if cja were here, right about now i'd be debating with him whether or not there are moral issues with being a lolicon, and about the illogical problems with culture in general, especially america
well, i've apparently just been an eccentric person all my life; i don't understand a lot of social norms

right.text: a complicated example: i find most pornography absolutely revolting, and this makes me ponder the mental state most people must be in

left.text: a simple example: i don't see why people won't eat food that's been dropped on the floor

title: loli is not pedo: the world according to guy, part 1
